ModMetaData.name: Make Your Bulk
ModMetaData.author: AlenDio
ModMetaData.description: Tired of crafting items one by one? This mod allows you to automatically make new Bulk recipes based on existing ones. How to use Go to "Settings -> Mod Options -> Make Your Bulk". - Add Recipe: Select an existing recipe to create its bulk version. - Remove Recipe: Remove a previously created bulk recipe (Restart required). - Reset list: Clear every bulk recipes (Restart required). - Save/Load list: Allows to save and then load an already created list. Features - BulkUnfinishedThing: Allow partially completed items to be stored and resumed later. - Same Quality: All the products of the recipe will have the same quality. - Products Multiplier: Set how many products will be produced. - Work Amount Multiplier: Set the percentage of the amount of work. - Cost Multiplier: Set the percentage of the cost of the ingredients.
